B003AI2VGA.title: The Virgin of Juarez
B003AI2VGA.synopsis: In this riveting crime drama, Minnie Driver ("Good Will Hunting") stars as an LA reporter who meets Mariela, a rare survivor of the vicious attacks taking place in the border town of Ciudad, Juárez.

entities.synopsis: HD. Widower Matt Damon comes up with a unique plan to lift his family out of their collective funk: by purchasing a ramshackle zoo.
entities.title: We Bought A Zoo

entities.synopsis: In the future, all emotions are outlawed. A law enforcement officer finally rebels against the system.
entities.title: Equilibrium

entities.synopsis: With his new apprentice Amanda (Shawnee Smith), the puppet-master behind the cruel, intricate games that have terrified a community and baffled police has once again eluded capture and vanished.
entities.title: Saw III - Unrated

entities.synopsis: HD. Mel Gibson directed and stars in this rousing 1995 Best Picture Oscar(R)-winner about 13th-century Scottish patriot William Wallace.
entities.title: Braveheart

entities.synopsis: Season 1・James Roday plays the somewhat eccentric Shawn Spencer, a police consultant who solves crimes with powers of observation so acute that the police think he's psychic - or so he lets them think.
entities.title: Psych Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Hank is dismayed that Karen is engaged and takes a gig as an L.A. blogger.

entities.synopsis: Season 1・A regular 26-year-old everyman has his life thrown into disarray after his friend, a CIA agent, sends him an e-mail that results in the world's secrets becoming embedded in his mind.
entities.title: Chuck Season 1

focusMessage.message: Free trial of AMC+ or buy

entities.synopsis: Season 1・AMC's original series TURN: Washington's Spies is the untold story of America's first spy ring. An unlikely team of secret agents form The Culper Ring to help George Washington turn the tide of the Revolutionary War. Only on AMC.
entities.title: TURN: Washington's Spies Season 1

focusMessage.message: Free trial of Paramount+ or buy

entities.synopsis: Season 1・In Season 1, Jason Gideon leads the BAU team along with fellow profilers Aaron Hotchner, Elle Greenway, Derek Morgan, and genius-geek Spencer Reid.
entities.title: Criminal Minds, Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・In Season One, Cal heads up a private agency contracted by the FBI, local police, law firms, corporations, and private individuals when they hit roadblocks in their searches for the truth. Joining him are a variety of experts in the field of behavioral evaluation: Dr. Gillian Foster is a gifted psychologist and Cal's professional partner, a woman whose guidance Cal needs, whether he knows it or not; Will Loker is Cal's lead researcher, and he is so aware of the human tendency to lie that he has decided to uncomplicate matters and practice what he terms "radical honesty": he says everything on his mind at all times. Ria Torres, the newest member of the team, arrives at the truth differently by acting more on instinct and using her natural, less-studied ability to read body language and catch certain clues that Cal's other pledges may miss. Lie To Me probes how people can deceive themselves just as easily as they deceive others, and explores the idea that there is nothing more revealing than when we choose to tell the truth and when we decide to lie.
entities.title: Lie to Me Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・After years of facing megalomaniacal supervillains, havoc-wrecking monsters, and alien invaders, the Man of Steel and famous journalist Lois Lane return to the idyllic town of Smallville to raise their teenage sons, Jonathan and Jordan.
entities.title: Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Sydney Bristow (Jennifer Garner) discovers that her employer, SD6, is not part of the government but actually an enemy organization. She goes to work undercover at SD6 as a double agent, while actually working with the CIA. Her greatest ally is another fellow double agent: her father.
entities.title: Alias Season 1

entities.displayTitle: 15: The Life and Death of Philip Knight
entities.synopsis: This dramatized documentary tells the true and tragic story of Philip Knight, a fifteen-year-old who was found hanging in his cell at Swansea adult prison.
entities.title: 15: The Life and Death of Philip Knight

entities.synopsis: H4 translates Shakespeare's plays, Henry IV parts I and II, into a futuristic Los Angeles to explore political struggles in the black community.
entities.title: H4

entities.synopsis: Joseph is the youngest and favorite son of the Kellars, a large family that owns a successful garment business in Los Angeles. When his brothers grow so envious of the affection that Joseph receives from their father, Jacob, they scheme to abandon Joseph in New York and convince their dad that he's dead.
entities.title: Joseph's Gift

entities.synopsis: HD. Cryptic cell-phone messages foreshadow a series of grisly deaths in this scary remake.
entities.title: One Missed Call

focusMessage.message: Watch with a free Prime trial

entities.synopsis: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.
entities.title: The Crime Of Padre Amaro

entities.synopsis: Season 1・In the highly anticipated first season of Dollhouse, Echo (Eliza Dushku) is an "Active," a member of a highly illegal and underground group who have had their personalities wiped clean so they can be imprinted with any number of new personas. Confined to a secret facility known as the "Dollhouse," Echo and the other Actives including Sierra and Victor carry out engagements assigned by Adelle, one of the Dollhouse leaders. The engagements cater to the wealthy, powerful and connected, and require the Actives to immerse themselves in all manner of scenarios - romantic, criminal, uplifting, dangerous, comical and the occasional "pro bono" good deed. After each scenario, Echo, always under the watchful eye of her handler Boyd, returns to the mysterious Dollhouse where her thoughts, feelings and experiences are erased by Topher, the Dollhouse's genius programmer. Echo enters the next scenario with no memory of before. Or does she?
entities.title: Dollhouse Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Meet Annie Walker (Piper Perabo), a young CIA trainee who is thrust into the inner sanctum of the agency when she is unexpectedly promoted to field operative. While it appears that she has been plucked from obscurity for her exceptional linguistic skills, there may be something or someone from her past that her CIA bosses are really after.
entities.title: Covert Affairs Season 1

focusMessage.message: Free trial of FlixLatino, rent, or buy

entities.synopsis: The story of a turbulent theatrical production, a Mexican company rehearse Albert Camus Caligula for an International Festival.

entities.synopsis: Todo empieza con un juego provocativo en una reunión entre amigos, que rápidamente se convierte en una aventura, llena de giros. Una comedia sobre los secretos que todos cargamos en nuestros bolsillos.
entities.title: Perfectos desconocidos

entities.synopsis: Es la historia de Pedro, un soltero cuarentón que le gusta la fiesta, no tiene hijos y vive de noche. Todo cambia cuando conoce a Aline. Ella le menciona que está buscando a su papá y que hay probabilidad de que sea él. Esto cambiará la vida a Pedro.
entities.title: ¡Qué despadre!

entities.displayTitle: Love in The Time of Cholera
entities.synopsis: Based on Nobel Prize-winning author Gabriel García Márquez's novel of the same name, director Mike Newell's “Love in the Time of Cholera” details a passionate love triangle.

entities.synopsis: HD. This film based on the non-fiction expose dramatizes aspects of the fast-food industry and the various people connected with it.
entities.title: Fast Food Nation

entities.synopsis: David Green, un comediante sin talento, recibe repentinamente una casa como herencia en México. Su plan de vender la propiedad y volver a Estados Unidos de inmediato, se detiene al conocer a Sol y descubrir junto a ella grandes secretos de su pasado.
entities.title: American Curious

entities.synopsis: Season 1・After her fiancé cheats, Cristina looks for a new roommate and finds Alejandro, who she welcomes into her home because she thinks he’s gay. By the time Alejandro tells her the truth, it’s too late and they’re already in love with each other.
entities.title: De Brutas Nada - Season 1

entities.synopsis: A Mexican-American (Leguizamo) chases his dreams as he puts together a classic Mexican band to compete in a radio station sponsored contest, all while attempting to court a beautiful girl.
entities.title: Sueno

entities.synopsis: Enter the mind of Jim (Jake Hoffman) - a socially awkward EDM musician with a traumatic past, a tenuous grip on reality, and voices in his head. When he meets Wendy (Nikki Reed), he thinks he might finally have a shot at happiness. But as long-buried memories begin to stir, and his crush turns into obsession, Jim finds himself looking into a violent abyss... and he won't be going alone.
entities.title: Enter the Dangerous Mind

entities.synopsis: Tres amigos en un velero deciden explorar una isla desierta que encuentran a la mitad del Caribe. Lo que comenzó como un fin de semana de diversión se vuelve una incansable lucha por la superviviencia cuando descubren un terrible secreto.
entities.title: Paraiso Perdido (Spanish Audio)

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Everyone has a secret... and Olivia Pope has dedicated her life to protecting and defending the public images of the nation's elite and keeping those secrets under wraps.
entities.title: Scandal Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 3・The elite detectives of the Organized Crime Control Bureau return to take down New York City's most dangerous illegal syndicates in Season 3 of "Law & Order: Organized Crime," created by Emmy® Award-winner Dick Wolf.

entities.synopsis: Season 1・A young woman and her three friends struggle through their post-collegiate years in NYC in this coming-of-age comedy series.

entities.title: The Sopranos

entities.displayTitle: 10 Best Collection of the Chappelle's Show

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Breaking the conventions of the cop genre, this popular and critically acclaimed series plays out in the tough, morally ambiguous world of an inner-city Los Angeles police precinct in which the line between good and evil is crossed every day. Michael Chiklis has won Emmy and Golden Globe awards for his portrayal of Detective Vic Mackey, leader of the elite Strike Team, an effective but corrupt...
entities.title: The Shield, Season 1

entities.synopsis: Season 1・Relive every episode of Broad City Seasons 1 and 2. From Abbi and Ilana's mad dash to get Lil Wayne tickets to the duo's wild adventure through St. Marks Place, each and every one of the girls' exploits is right here.

entities.displayTitle: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit Season 1
entities.synopsis: Season 1・Law & Order: Special Victims Unit chronicles the life and crimes of the elite Special Victims Unit of the NYPD. Each episode features a new case to solve, new victims to console as well as the constant struggle for the detectives to juggle the emotional toll of the job and the pressure it puts on their personal lives. The show stars Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Dann Florek, Richard Belzer, Dean Winters and Michelle Hurd. The series follows Detective Elliot Stabler (Meloni) and his partner Olivia Benson (Hargitay). Overseeing the unit is Captain Donald Cragen (Florek).
entities.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit Season 1

entities.displayTitle: Third Watch: The Complete First Season
